# zoneID

**Instance Property**

The ID of the record zone that contains the records to search.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var zoneID: CKRecordZone.ID? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property limits the scope of the search to only the records in the specified record zone. If you don’t specify a record zone, the search includes all record zones.

When you create an operation using the [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKQueryOperation/init(cursor:)] method, this property’s value is `nil` and CloudKit ignores any changes that you make to it. When the operation executes, the cursor provides the record zone information from the original search that provides the cursor.

## Configuring the Query Operation

- **query**: The query for the search.
- **cursor**: The  cursor for continuing the search.
- **CKQueryOperation.Cursor**: An object that marks the stopping point for a query and the starting point for retrieving the remaining results.
- **resultsLimit**: The maximum number of records to return at one time.
- **maximumResults**: A constant value that represents the maximum number of results CloudKit retrieves.
- **desiredKeys**: The fields of the records to fetch.
